overview: Lucy Harmon, an American teenager is arriving in the lush Tuscan countryside to be sculpted by a family friend who lives in a beautiful villa. Lucy visited there four years earlier and exchanged a kiss with an Italian boy with whom she hopes to become reacquainted.
tagline: The most beautiful place to be is in love.
cast: Liv Tyler|Sinéad Cusack|Jeremy Irons|Jason Flemyng|Joseph Fiennes
